metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0317 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Movable Type before 4.38, 5.0x before 5.07, and 5.1x before 5.13 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that modify data via the (1) commenting feature or (2) community script.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0317` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
